com.risk.business

Interface IStrategy

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    Aggressive, Benevolent, Cheater, Human, Random

    public interface IStrategy
    This Interface defines a Strategy in accordance with Strategy Design Pattern. Every concrete implementation of it will be a class representing a specific strategy to be implemented. In our Game we have Human, Aggressive, Benevolent, Random and Cheater as specific Strategies. Core methods in this interface which will vary as per different strategies are: reinforce, attack and fortify.
    Version:
    0.0.1
    Author:
    ApoorvSemwal

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      GamePlay attack(GamePlay game_play)
      This method is called to execute attack phase for a particular strategy and updates the state of the game accordingly.
      GamePlay fortify(GamePlay game_play)
      This method initially checks for each fortification validation based on which it executes a valid fortify move involving certain actions like populating messages, increment/decrement armies from respective player territories.
      GamePlay reinforce(GamePlay game_play)
      This method is called to execute reinforcement phase for a particular strategy and updates the state of the game accordingly.

    • Method Detail

      • reinforce

        GamePlay reinforce(GamePlay game_play)
        This method is called to execute reinforcement phase for a particular strategy and updates the state of the game accordingly. It also handles the trading of cards during game play.
        Parameters:
        game_play - state of the game i.e. entire game related info when reinforcement starts for a player.
        Returns:
        GamePlay updated state of the game after reinforcement phase ends.

      • attack

        GamePlay attack(GamePlay game_play)
        This method is called to execute attack phase for a particular strategy and updates the state of the game accordingly. It will have the functionality for attack which initially check for each attack validation based on which it perform a valid attack move involving actions like populating message, increment/decrement armies from respective player and last if attacker occupy defender territory then add defender territory to attacker territory list and remove from defender territory list
        Parameters:
        game_play - state of the game i.e. entire game related info when attack starts for a player.
        Returns:
        GamePlay updated state of the game after attack phase ends.

      • fortify

        GamePlay fortify(GamePlay game_play)
        This method initially checks for each fortification validation based on which it executes a valid fortify move involving certain actions like populating messages, increment/decrement armies from respective player territories.
        Parameters:
        game_play - : GamePlay Object
        Returns:
        GamePlay updated state of the game after fortification phase.
